verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \add hath he quickened\add*, who \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* in \w trespasses|strong="G3900"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*;

\w Wherein|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* time \w past|strong="G4218"\w* ye \w walked|strong="G4043"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w course|strong="G0165"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w prince|strong="G0758"\w* of the \w power|strong="G1849"\w* of the \w air|strong="G0109"\w*, the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w children|strong="G5207"\w* of \w disobedience|strong="G0543"\w*:

\w Among|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* had our \w conversation|strong="G0390"\w* in times \w past|strong="G4218"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w fulfilling|strong="G4160"\w* the \w desires|strong="G2307"\w* of the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w mind|strong="G1271"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* by \w nature|strong="G5449"\w* the \w children|strong="G5043"\w* of \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w*, \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w others|strong="G3062"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, who \w is|strong="G5607"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w great|strong="G4183"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w wherewith|strong="G3739"\w* he \w loved|strong="G0025"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w*,

\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G5607"\w* \w we|strong="G2248"\w* \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w dead|strong="G3498"\w* in \w sins|strong="G3900"\w*, hath quickened us together \w with|strong="G4806"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, (by \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*;)

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w raised|strong="G4891"\w* \add us\add* up \w together|strong="G4891"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w made|strong="G4776"\w* \add us\add* sit \w together|strong="G4776"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavenly|strong="G2032"\w* \add places\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w ages|strong="G0165"\w* to \w come|strong="G1904"\w* he might \w shew|strong="G1731"\w* the \w exceeding|strong="G5235"\w* \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \add his\add* \w kindness|strong="G5544"\w* \w toward|strong="G1909"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* by \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w are|strong="G2075"\w* ye \w saved|strong="G4982"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G5216"\w*: \add it is\add* the \w gift|strong="G1435"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:
\w Not|strong="G3756"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* should \w boast|strong="G2744"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* we \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w workmanship|strong="G4161"\w*, \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath before \w ordained|strong="G4282"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we should \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="G1352"\w* \w remember|strong="G3421"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \add being\add* in time \w past|strong="G4218"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, who \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* \w Uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* that which \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w called|strong="G3004"\w* the \w Circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* made by \w hands|strong="G5499"\w*;

\w That|strong="G3754"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w that|strong="G1565"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* ye \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w without|strong="G5565"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, being \w aliens|strong="G0526"\w* from the \w commonwealth|strong="G4174"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strangers|strong="G3581"\w* from the \w covenants|strong="G1242"\w* of \w promise|strong="G1860"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* without \w God|strong="G0112"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w sometimes|strong="G4218"\w* \w were|strong="G5607"\w* far \w off|strong="G3112"\w* are \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w nigh|strong="G1451"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath broken \w down|strong="G3089"\w* the middle \w wall|strong="G3320"\w* of \w partition|strong="G5418"\w* \add between us\add*;

Having \w abolished|strong="G2673"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* the \w enmity|strong="G2189"\w*, \add even\add* the \w law|strong="G3551"\w* of \w commandments|strong="G1785"\w* \add contained\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w ordinances|strong="G1378"\w*; \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w make|strong="G2936"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w himself|strong="G1438"\w* of \w twain|strong="G1417"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w new|strong="G2537"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \add so\add* \w making|strong="G4160"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* that \w he|strong="G0846"\w* might \w reconcile|strong="G0604"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w* unto \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*, having \w slain|strong="G0615"\w* the \w enmity|strong="G2189"\w* \w thereby|strong="G1722"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* and \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* which \w were|strong="G3588"\w* afar \w off|strong="G3112"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to them that \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w nigh|strong="G1451"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w we|strong="G2192"\w* \w both|strong="G0297"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w access|strong="G4318"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G3767"\w* \w therefore|strong="G0686"\w* ye \w are|strong="G2075"\w* no \w more|strong="G3765"\w* \w strangers|strong="G3581"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w foreigners|strong="G3941"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w fellowcitizens|strong="G4847"\w* with the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w household|strong="G3609"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

And are \w built|strong="G2026"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w foundation|strong="G2310"\w* of the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophets|strong="G4396"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w being|strong="G5607"\w* the chief \w corner|strong="G0204"\w* \add stone\add*;

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w building|strong="G3619"\w* fitly framed \w together|strong="G4883"\w* \w groweth|strong="G0837"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* an \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w temple|strong="G3485"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* are builded \w together|strong="G4925"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* an \w habitation|strong="G2732"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w through|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.
